title: 1937 FIRA Tournament
text: The 1937 FIRA Tournament was the second <a href="Rugby%20Union">Rugby Union</a> European championship, organized by the recently formed <a href="FIRA%20%E2%80%93%20Association%20of%20European%20Rugby">FIRA</a>. It was played in <a href="Paris">Paris</a> during the <a href="Exposition%20Internationale%20des%20Arts%20et%20Techniques%20dans%20la%20Vie%20Moderne">Exposition Internationale des Arts et Techniques dans la Vie Moderne</a>.
